title: How to determine when my child is going through Puberty? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Saima says how do I determine when a child is going through puberty a male child has three signs one reaching the age of fifteen to one of these times not all of them so if not he can ejaculate semen so a child of 12 or 13 he gets a nocturnal emission a wet dream this is a sign of his puberty 3 growing the harsh rough hair all over the pubic area these three signs for both boys and girls and girls have a fourth sine which is monthly cycle
